attributes.additional_details:
The TV Licence is outdated and should be scrapped, If not instantly then reduced by 20% per year over 5 years to allow companies to adjust.

I never subscribed for the BBC, I pay for BBC Content online on apple tv, blinkbox, netflix and more, also if I watch live TV online then due to current technology you may also get adverts so its not an ad free service.

I don't use freeview or general live TV but would subscribe to one or two channels if offered.

Please review the outdated TV Licence left by previous generations.
